Operation Smile - Medical Mission

Volunteered as a high schooler for a medical mission in Vietnam through Operation Smile.

Monday - June 18, 2012

1 minute read ∙ 58 words

0 Comments

Name

Medical Mission

Organizer

Operation Smile

Location

Hanoi, Vietnam

Date

June 7th to 18th, 2012

Role

High School Student Volunteer

About

I volunteered as a high schooler for a medical mission in Vietnam where I was responsible for educating the families there on best post-surgery care methods, helping the kids feel less scared and giving away care packages.
